Synopsis: Creates small services that run PowerShell
Description: Creates small services that run PowerShell on a regular basis

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Out-Daemon -ScriptBlock {    
    Write-Warning "Warning"
    Write-Error "Error"
    $VerbosePreference = 'continue'
    Write-Verbose "Verbose"
    $debugPreference = 'continue'
    Write-Debug "Debug"
    Write-Progress "a" "b" -PercentComplete 1
    1
    New-Object PSObject -Property @{"A" = "b";"c" = "d" }
} -Interval "00:00:15" -Name streamtest
